attributes.action: minimum wage for staff in the greyhound industry
attributes.additional_details:
Staff in the greyhound racing industry in particular kennel staff in many cases are not being paid the national minimum wage.
We want the government to carry out an investigation into this practice as our sports governing body the gbgb is aware of the practice but chooses not to get involved in the issue where humans are being exploited in order to enable the industry to function.
